summary: Test suite for the SHAP explanation pipelines in the Diffusers library, comprising lightweight unit tests with mocked components and comprehensive integration tests. It verifies core functionalities such as inference precision, batch processing, model serialization, CPU offloading, SHAP value generation, and image‑to‑image generation behavior on both CPU and GPU environments.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and robustness of SHAP‑based diffusion pipelines, enabling reliable deployment and preventing regressions in model inference, saving/loading, and hardware compatibility.
